name: c-flo
description: MsgFlo setup for the c-base space station

scripts.start: msgflo --componentdir components --graph graphs/main.json --runtime-id=a9dca883-c07f-4cd7-b369-180fa9b52b68 --ping-interval=600 --host=c-flo.cbrp3.c-base.org --wait-timeout 1200 --ignore barstatus_bar --ignore barstatus_clab --ignore barstatus_nerdarea --ignore barstatus_switch --ignore bubbler --ignore c_leuse --ignore c_out_generator --ignore c_out_output --ignore crew --ignore mainhall --ignore mechblast --ignore nerd --ignore nerdctrl_switch --ignore powermon --ignore echelon --ignore time --ignore vacuum --ignore siri --ignore megablast-display --ignore roboblast-display --ignore ingress-lights --ignore ingress-data --ignore station-announcer --ignore c-boom --ignore megablast --ignore he1 --ignore nerdctrl-display --ignore hallway-display --ignore bigswitch --ignore c-lab-display --ignore mainhall-display --ignore nerdarea-display --ignore soundlab-display --ignore weltenbau-display --ignore c-leuse-display
scripts.foreign: msgflo-register --role barstatus_bar:components/statuslight.yml --role barstatus_clab:components/statuslight.yml --role barstatus_nerdarea:components/statuslight.yml --role barstatus_switch:components/barstatus.yml --role bubbler:components/panel.yml --role c_leuse:components/playsound.yml --role c_out_generator:components/c_out.yml --role c_out_output:components/playsound.yml --role crew:components/crew.yml --role mainhall:components/dmx.yml --role mechblast:components/playsound.yml --role nerd:components/pedestrianlight.yml --role nerdctrl_switch:components/nerdctrl.yml --role powermon:components/powermon.yml --role echelon:components/echelon.yml --role time:components/time.yml --role vacuum:components/Vacuum.yml --role c-boom:components/buttonpanel.yml --role megablast-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role he1:components/mqttwebview.yml --role roboblast-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role siri:components/mqttwebview.yml --role nerdctrl-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role hallway-display:components/c-beam-viewer.yml --role bigswitch:components/BigSwitch.yml --role c-lab-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role mainhall-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role nerdarea-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role soundlab-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role weltenbau-display:components/mqttwebview.yml --role c-leuse-display:components/mqttwebview.yml
